statements: DELETE FROM products WHERE name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
DELETE FROM categories WHERE category_id = 5 AND product_id = 12;
DELETE FROM categories WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE price > 100);
DELETE FROM categories WHERE id IN (SELECT category_id FROM product_categories WHERE product_id = 1);
DELETE FROM categories WHERE id IN (SELECT category_id FROM product_categories WHERE product_id = 1);
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE pc FROM ProductCategory pc JOIN Category c ON pc.category_id = c.id WHERE c.name = 'Electronics';
DELETE p, pc FROM Product p JOIN ProductCategory pc ON p.id = pc.product_id WHERE p.price > 100.00;
